mapper.insert:
select seq_trainer.nextval from dual
insert into trainer values( #{trainerNo}, #{memberNo}, #{trainerProfileImg}, #{trainerAddress1}, #{trainerAddresss2}, #{trainerZip})
mapper.select:
select count(*) from member m right join trainer t on m.member_no = t.member_no
m.member_id like '%'||#{member_id}||'%'
m.member_name like '%'||#{member_name}||'%'
and m.member_status = #{member_status}
order by m.member_no desc

select count(*) from member m right join trainer t on m.member_no = t.member_no right join posting p on t.trainer_no = p.trainer_no where ${searchKeyword} like '%'||#{searchValue}||'%' and m.member_status = 3 order by m.member_no desc

select * from (select rownum rn, board.* from (select * from member m right join trainer t on m.member_no = t.member_no right join posting p on t.trainer_no = p.trainer_no where ${searchKeyword} like '%'||#{searchValue}||'%' and m.member_status = 3 order by m.member_no desc) board) where rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
